entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow #28811
  • Add Analyzer to warn about implement IDisposable on types registered into your services #28810
    Backlog
  • [Android] java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot transition entry that is not in the back stack #28809
  • Handling Views in Landscape & Portrait Mode #28808
  • [Testing] Reenable flaky UI test with Issue19509Test #28806
  • [Android] HybridWebView crash app #28801
  • Remove .NET 8 specific code from sample content template #28800
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Contol disappears when android:hardwareAccelerated="false" #28798

Closed

  • Light up .NET MAUI Item Templates for .NET MAUI Solution #6416
    Backlog
  • Bump CommunityToolkit/SF on IncludeSampleContent template #28324
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Deprecate platform-specifics that run on ListView #28757
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #8989
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Unable to use custom appicon always defaults to android appicon #27625
  • win: EmptyView of CollectionView can only locate on top of the view #19627
  • MAUI Blazor App WebView2 Fails Silently When Installed to C:\Program Files #28792
  • iOS Push notification icon keep using default .NET #28799
  • App crashes on android after about 1 hr usage with Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -1 (SI_QUEUE) in tid 6664 (SGen worker) #28558
  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #28648
  • ViewExtensions.CancelAnimations DOES NOT WORK verified windows android and iOS! #21964
  • tutorial application issue #27814
  • Custom BindableProperty on Triggers not working #21992
  • [Android] Setting the background property of Picker/Spinner in a handler mapping does not work for .net 8 #28317
  • To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android #28508
  • RealParent of StackLayout has been Garbage Collected #28608

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky Issue19509Test in CI #28807
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed NullReferenceException when using x:Name with SolidColorBrush #28805
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Transparent Background Color not applied to WebView #28804
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Resaved TabbedPage UI Test Images for Catalyst Due to Tab Bar Background Color Variations #28803
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 " #28802
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • Android TimePicker ignores 24 hour system setting when using Format Property - fix #28797
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker

Merged

  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui reference in sample content template #28510
    p/0, area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 6 #28747
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28794
    .NET 9 SR4.2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28793

Updated

  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation #28756
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28486 #28780
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Fix Visual State Issue with Picker TextColor After Navigation #28746
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [iOS ]Fix for issue -> Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region #28795
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
